DOC.brief_summary: Try to find lung cancer stem cells from primary culture of routine surgical resection of lung cancer tissue including cancer cells and stroma cells, then characterization the established cell lines, and compare the difference of stroma cells between tumor part and surrounding part.
DOC.brief_title: Established Lung Cancer Cell Line and Stroma Cell From Surgical Tissue
DOC.criteria: lung cancer patient with surgical resection of lung tumor lung cancer patient without surgical resection of lung tumor
